      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Trains a sentiment model. The -trainPath argument points to a labeled sentiment treebank. The trees in this data will be used to train the model parameters (also to seed the model vocabulary). The -devPath argument points to a second labeled sentiment treebank. The trees in this data will be used to periodically evaluate the performance of the model. We won't train on this data; it will only be used to test how well the model generalizes to unseen data. The -model argument specifies where to save the learned sentiment model.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments
